attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if we're going to do this lets DO IT....the drip feed deaths in service are an outrage, boost the troops 10 fold and get THE JOB DONE...you are an un elected and unelectable lame/sitting duck...this can be your swan/duck song ....more troops to afghanistan

rejection.details: Please resubmit your petition with a more specific set of requests. Your current petition is too general.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
